definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Use your knuckles to briskly rub the Hoku point for thirty seconds.
sentences.chinese: 用你的指關節要輕快揉合谷穴30秒的點。

sentences.english: My knuckles whitened from my tense grip on the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 我的指關節從我在方向盤的緊張的夾子漂白了。

sentences.english: Vascularized joint transfer has been used for the reconstruction of traumatized finger joints.
sentences.chinese: 帶血管莖關節轉移術，可作爲指關節損傷之重建。

sentences.english: He tried to steal sugar under his aunt's very nose, and got his knuckles rapped for it.
sentences.chinese: 他當着姨媽的面偷糖喫，結果被她用指關節敲了一頓。

sentences.english: Traumatic dislocation of the metacarpophalangeal joint is a relatively uncommon injury.
sentences.chinese: 外傷性脫位的掌指關節是一種相對少見的損傷。

sentences.english: When I amfinished she sits with her head bowed, twisting her arthritic fingers intostrange shapes.
sentences.chinese: 當我解釋完，她低着頭坐着，不停地扭動着手指關節。

sentences.english: Looping a letter the wrongway resulted in a swift clip across the knuckles with a ruler.
sentences.chinese: 只要一寫錯，老師就用戒尺打指關節。

sentences.english: I bandage his knuckles, which is hard with these claws I have.
sentences.chinese: 我用繃帶包紮他被我爪子弄傷的指關節。

sentences.english: He knuckled me in the chest .
sentences.chinese: 他用指關節敲擊我的胸部。

sentences.english: I hit him with my fist and hurt my knuckles.
sentences.chinese: 我用拳頭打他，我的指關節打痛了。

sentences.english: Like Joey's constant knuckle-cracking isn't annoying?
sentences.chinese: 像喬伊，常扳指關節就不惹人厭嗎？

sentences.english: But she uses her knuckles to text on a mobile phone.
sentences.chinese: 不過，她發短信用的是指關節。

sentences.english: Skill levels are from very easy to real knuckle busters .
sentences.chinese: 技能水準是從非常容易對真正的指關節釘頭切斷機。

sentences.english: Now,the knucklebone theory of personal identity is a very stupid theory.
sentences.chinese: 這個指關節骨的個人認同感理論是愚蠢的。

sentences.english: You must knock on doors until your knuckles bleed.
sentences.chinese: 你必須去敲一扇扇的門，直到指關節流血。

sentences.english: He cracked the joints of his fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他把手指關節弄的噼啪作響。
